name: Sharpedo ex
author: Hikaru Koike

attacks.name: Drag Off
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, you may switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with the Defending Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 20 damage to the new Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch.

attacks.name: Darkness Blast
attacks.effect: You may discard a {D} Energy attached to Sharpedo ex. If you do, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage and discard 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
